home.title: Stalela — Lawula ishishini lakho. Thina sijongana ne-admin.
home.description: Ubhaliso lwenkampani, ukuthobela, kunye nenkxaso yebhanki yamashishini aseMzantsi Afrika.

howItWorks.title: Isebenza Njani — Stalela
howItWorks.description: Amanyathelo amane alula ukusuka kwingcamango ukuya kwinkampani ebhalisiweyo nethobela umthetho eMzantsi Afrika.

pricing.title: Amaxabiso — Stalela
pricing.description: Amaxabiso alula, acacileyo obhaliso lwenkampani neenkonzo zokuthobela.

contact.title: Qhagamshelana Nathi — Stalela
contact.description: Qhagamshelana neStalela ukufumana inkxaso yobhaliso lweshishini nokuthobela.

register.title: Bhalisa Ishishini Lakho — Stalela
register.description: Qala ubhaliso lwenkampani yakho neStalela. Gcwalisa iinkcukacha zakho siza kwenza konke okunye.

services.title: Iinkonzo — Stalela
services.description: Ubhaliso lwenkampani, ukuthobela, irhafu, ibhanki, B-BBEE, iinkonzo zobuchwepheshe, nokunye okungakumbi kwama-SME aseMzantsi Afrika.

blog.title: Ibhlog — Stalela
blog.description: Ulwazi, izikhokelo, neendaba malunga nobhaliso lweshishini nokuthobela eMzantsi Afrika.

Nav.featuredDescription: Bhalisa i-Pty Ltd, i-NPC, okanye i-CC ne-CIPC. Sijongana nokugcinwa kwegama, ukulungiswa kwe-MOI, nokunikezelwa kwesatifikethi.

Footer.tagline: Ubhaliso lwenkampani, ukuthobela, kunye nenkxaso yebhanki yamashishini aseMzantsi Afrika.

companyRegistration.title: Ubhaliso Lwenkampani
companyRegistration.headline:
Bhalisa inkampani yakho
ngaphandle kwengxaki.
companyRegistration.description: I-Pty Ltd, i-NPC, i-CC — sijongana nokugcinwa kwegama le-CIPC, ukulungiswa kwe-MOI, nokunikezelwa kwesatifikethi. Qala ishishini lakho ngendlela efanelekileyo.

taxCompliance.title: Irhafu Nokuthobela
taxCompliance.headline:
Hlala uthobela.
Phepha izohlwayo.
taxCompliance.description: Ubhaliso lwe-SARS, ii-annual returns, i-UIF, i-Compensation Fund, ne-POPIA — sikugcina kwicala elifanelekileyo lomthetho.

banking.title: Ibhanki Nezemali
banking.headline:
Vula iakhawunti yebhanki
yeshishini, lula.
banking.description: Ukulungiswa kwamaxwebhu nokuthunyelwa kwibhanki ukuze ufumane iakhawunti yakho yeshishini ivuliwe ngaphandle kwemibambano.

certifications.title: Iziqinisekiso
certifications.headline:
Fumana iziqinisekiso.
Wina iithenda ezingakumbi.
certifications.description: Izatifikethi ze-B-BBEE, ubulungu be-NSBC, nesatifikethi se-Proudly South African — iziqinisekiso ishishini lakho elizidingayo.

techDigital.title: Ubuchwepheshe Nedijithali
techDigital.headline:
Iiwebhusayithi, ii-app,
ama-brand ne-AI.
techDigital.description: Istudiyo sedijithali esipheleleyo — uyilo lwelogo, i-SEO, isoftware eyenzelwe ngokukhethekileyo, ukudibanisa iintlawulo, ii-app zemobhayile, ii-chatbot, nokunye okungakumbi.

HomePage.servicesHeading: Konke ishishini lakho elikudingayo ukuze lihlale lisemgceni neStalela
HomePage.servicesSubheading: Ukusuka kubhaliso ukuya ekuthobeleni, ibhanki ukuya kwi-brand — simboza umjikelo opheleleyo.
HomePage.howItWorksSubheading: Amanyathelo amane ukusuka kwingcamango ukuya kwishishini elithobela umthetho ngokupheleleyo.
HomePage.howItWorksImageAlt: Amanyathelo amane okubhalisa nokulawula ishishini lakho

1.title: Ngenisa iinkcukacha zakho
1.description: Sixelele ngeshishini lakho, abalawuli, noko ukudingayo.

2.title: Sibhalisa inkampani yakho
2.description: Sijongana nokungeniswa kwe-CIPC, ukulungiswa kwamaxwebhu, nokulandelela.

3.title: Sikugcina uthobela
3.description: Izikhumbuzi ezizenzekayo nenkxaso yokufayila ii-annual returns, i-VAT, i-PAYE, nokunye okungakumbi.

4.title: Wena gxila kwishishini lakho
4.description: Lawula ishishini lakho ngentembeko ngelixa thina sijongana ne-admin.

HomePage.ctaDescription: Qala ngemizuzu. Siza kukukhokela kuyo yonke inkqubo.

HowItWorks.heading: Isebenza njani
HowItWorks.description: Ukusuka ekungeniseni kwakho kokuqala kwefomu ukuya ekuthobeleni okuqhubekayo — naku okumele ukulindele.
HowItWorks.imageAlt: Amanyathelo okubhalisa ishishini ukuya ekuthobeleni okuqhubekayo

01.title: Ngenisa iinkcukacha zakho
01.description: Gcwalisa iinkcukacha zenkampani yakho, ulwazi lwabalawuli, uze ulayishe amaxwebhu afunekayo. Ifomu yethu ekhokelayo yenza kube lula — akukho lwimi lwezomthetho, akukho kuqashela.

02.title: Sibhalisa inkampani yakho
02.description: Iqela lethu lihlola ulwazi lwakho, lilungise ukungeniswa, lize lifayile ne-CIPC egameni lakho. Ufumana uhlaziyo kuwo onke amanyathelo.

03.title: Sikugcina uthobela
03.description: Xa ubhaliswe, silungiselela ikhalenda yakho yokuthobela. Ii-annual returns, i-VAT, i-PAYE — silandela imihla yokugqibela sikuncede ufayile ngexesha.

04.title: Wena gxila kwishishini lakho
04.description: Xa ubhaliso lugqityiwe nokuthobela kulawulwa, ungagxila ekukhuliseni ishishini lakho ngelixa thina sijongana ne-admin.
details: Isitoreji samaxwebhu azo zonke iirekodi zakho

Pricing.heading: Amaxabiso alula, acacileyo
Pricing.description: Khetha isicwangciso esifanele ishishini lakho. Akukho iindleko ezifihliweyo.
Pricing.ctaDescription: Thetha nathi siza kucebisa okona kufanelekileyo kwishishini lakho.

Contact.heading: Qhagamshelana nathi
Contact.description: Unombuzo okanye ulungile ukuqala? Singathanda ukuva kuwe.

Register.heading: Bhalisa ishishini lakho
Register.description: Gcwalisa iinkcukacha zakho ngezantsi neqela lethu liza kubuyela kuwe ukuqala inkqubo yokubhalisa.
Register.disclaimer: Ngokungenisa le fomu, uyavuma ukuqhagamshelwa ngeenkonzo zeStalela. Asabelani ngolwazi lwakho nabanye.

Services.heading: Iinkonzo zeStalela — Ulawulo Olupheleleyo Lweshishini
Services.description: Konke okudingayo ukuqala nokulawula ishishini elithobela umthetho eMzantsi Afrika neStalela. Bhrawuza ngokwezintlu okanye cofa nayiphi na inkonzo ukuze ufumane imbonakalo ekhawulezileyo.
Services.ctaDescription: Qhagamshelana neStalela siza kukunceda ufumane iinkonzo ezifanelekileyo zeshishini lakho.

CategoryPage.ctaDescription: Sivumele sijongane ne-admin ukuze ugxile kwishishini lakho.

ServicePage.ctaDescription: Qhagamshelana nathi siza kukukhokela kuyo yonke inkqubo.

Blog.heading: Ibhlog
Blog.description: Ulwazi, izikhokelo, neendaba zamashishini aseMzantsi Afrika.

NotFound.heading: Iphepha alifumaneki
NotFound.description: Siyaxolisa, asikwazanga ukufumana iphepha olifunayo. Kusenokwenzeka lisusiwe okanye alikho.
